name: Goblin Siege Engine
description: The Goblin Siege Engine is a Huge, steel-clad construct designed for battlefield dominance with a turret for riders. It has a robust frame and a large cannon mounted atop.
memorable: It deals double damage to structures, making it a terrifying force against fortifications.
goals: Typically employed by goblins to breach enemy defenses and create chaos in battles.
relations: Frequently found in goblin war camps or constructed by goblin engineers.
environment: Commonly found in areas of conflict, particularly near siege operations.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, resilient against nonmagic attacks, and advantageous in movement through difficult terrain.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks that rely on agility.
attacks: Performs multiple bludgeoning Slam attacks and can unleash a destructive jet of acid.
most_powerful_ability: Can deal double damage to objects, making it deadly against structures.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, but a basic passive Perception score of 10.
skills: Has a low perception score, indicating it is not keenly aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can serve as a mount for other creatures, providing half cover.
Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Immune to form-altering spells and effects.
Can move freely through difficult terrain.
test_queries: durable siege engine that shoots acid
construct designed for breaking down defenses
massive goblin machine with a turret
machine immune to many damage types
